launcher.LaunchSessionWithAccessKey: Launch session on behalf of the access key
launcher.DescCPU:
The CPU performs basic arithmetic, logic, controlling, and input/output (I/O) operations specified by the instructions.

For high performance computing workloads, many CPUs are helpful, but the program code must be written to use multiple CPUs.
launcher.DescMemory:
Computer memory is a temporary storage area.

It holds the data and instructions that the Central Processing Unit (CPU) needs.

When using a GPU in a machine learning workload, you must allocate at least twice the memory of the GPU to memory. Otherwise, the GPU's idle time will increase, resulting in a performance penalty.
launcher.DescSharedMemory:
Shared memory is memory that may be simultaneously accessed by multiple programs with an intent to provide communication among them or avoid redundant copies.

For multi-CPU or multi-threaded workloads, shared memory is important because it is used for inter-thread communication. For deep learning workloads and high performance computing workloads using multi-threaded, we recommend setting this value to 1 GB or higher.
launcher.DescGPU: GPUs are well-suited for the matrix/vector computations involved in machine learning. GPUs speed up training algorithms by orders of magnitude, reducing running times from weeks to days.
launcher.DescSession:
A session is a unit of computational environment that is created according to a specified environment and resources.

If this value is set to a value greater than 1, multiple sessions corresponding to the resource set above are created.

If there are not enough resources available, requests to create sessions that cannot be created are put on the waiting queue.
launcher.DescSingleNode: When running a session, the managed node and worker nodes are placed on a single physical node or virtual machine.
launcher.DescMultiNode: When running a session, one managed node and one or more worker nodes are split across multiple physical nodes or virtual machines.
launcher.MustSpecifyVersion: You must specify Environment and Version.
launcher.NoAvailableFolderToMount: There's no available folder to mount.
launcher.NoEnvConfigured: No additional environment variable is configured
launcher.HomeDirectoryDeletionDialog: The home directory in the session is automatically deleted when the session ends.
launcher.LaunchConfirmationDialog: To keep your code and data, or share it with other collaborators, simply create a storage folder in the data & storage sidebar, then mount that folder when you start the resource and keep it there.
launcher.SessionNameAllowCondition: Session name should have 4-64 alphabets/numbers without any whitespaces.
launcher.sessionStillPreparing: The session is still in preparation. After the session starts, tap the app icon to start the app.
launcher.SharedMemorySettingIsReduced: Shared memory setting is reduced to below the allocated memory.
launcher.ProxyNotReady: Proxy is not ready yet. Check proxy settings for detail.
launcher.SettingUpProxyForApp: Setting up proxy for the app...
launcher.DescSetEnv:
If you set a default environment variable in the container and also set an environment variable with the same name on the Backend.AI, the value set on the Backend.AI takes precedence.

Every input value will be initialized after starting session launcher.
Also, those environment will be passed only if both variable and value are not empty.
launcher.EnvironmentVariableTitle: Order of precedence: container vs Backend.AI internal variables
launcher.EnvConfigWillDisappear: Any unsaved environment variable and value will be disappeared.
launcher.FolderAliasOverlapping: Aliases overlap with other names that already exist
launcher.DescFolderAlias:
If you fill out this input, folder name will change to alias when it mount.

Absolute paths will be mount in '/', the others are sub path of /home/work

Don't use alias same as system folders.

Please check final path which is printed in 'Mounted folders' below.

If you want to see this window again, click icon next to the 'Path & Alias'
launcher.DescOpenMPOptimization:
This value sets the number of threads to use for parallel regions by setting the initial value of the nthreads-var internal control variable.

Backend.AI sets this value equal to the number of CPU cores, which has the effect of accelerating typical high-performance computing workloads. However, for some multi-threaded workloads, multiple processes using OpenMP are used at the same time, resulting in an abnormally large number of threads and significant performance degradation. In this case, please adjust this value to 1 or 2.

usersettings.DescDesktopNotification:
Turn on or off desktop notification.
If turned on, Backend.AI uses OS built-in notification system too. Turning off this option does not affect notifications within web UI.
usersettings.DescUseCompactSidebar:
Compact sidebar lets you use more workspace.
If this option is turned on, compact sidebar becomes the initial UI at startup.
usersettings.KeepLoginSessionInformation: Keep Login Session Information while Logout
usersettings.DescKeepLoginSessionInformation:
Let webui app keep current login session information next time.
If the option is turned off, login information will be cleared each logout.
usersettings.DescBetaFeatures:
Use beta features for Web UI.
Beta features may be unstable. Some beta features may not be adopted as official feature.
usersettings.BootstrapScriptDescription: Bootstrap script will be executed only once after session creation
usersettings.DialogDiscardOrSave: Current file and script will be changed without saving, Would you like to proceed?
usersettings.DialogNoSaveNoPreserve: Your changes will be lost if you don't save them.
usersettings.DescScriptUpdated: User config script updated. This will be applied to new sessions only.
usersettings.DescScriptCreated: User config script created. This will be applied to new sessions only.
usersettings.DescNewUserConfigFileCreated: New User config file can be created with non-empty data.
usersettings.DescScriptAllDeleted: All of created user config script were deleted.
usersettings.DescLetUserUpdateScriptWithNonEmptyValue: Please update script with non empty value.
usersettings.DescAutomaticUpdateCheck:
Notify when a new webui version is released.
In where the Internet is unstable or offline, this option will be automatically turned off. You can toggle this switch to start the automatic update check again.
usersettings.DescPreferredSSHPort:
Use this value as an SSH/SFTP port if possible.
If the port is already in use, assign another random port to SSH/SFTP. Leave blank to auto-assign.
usersettings.DescSSHKeypairManagement: Change SSH Keypair by randomly generating or by entering directly.

usersettings.InvalidPortNumber: Port number should be positive number between 1025~65534
usersettings.SSHKeyClipboardCopy: SSH Key has been copied to the clipboard.
usersettings.DescAutoLogout: Log out automatically if all logined pages are closed except session originated pages for apps(e.g. jupyter notebook, web terminal, etc.)
usersettings.SSHKeypairEnterManuallyFinished: SSH Keypair has been successfully registered.

webTerminalUsageGuide.CopyGuide: Advanced Web Terminal Usage: Copy terminal contents
webTerminalUsageGuide.CopyGuideOne: Press Ctrl + B key to enter tmux control mode.
webTerminalUsageGuide.CopyGuideTwo: Type :set -g mouse off and Press Enter Key.
webTerminalUsageGuide.CopyGuideThree: Now you can copy text from the terminal.
webTerminalUsageGuide.CopyGuideFour: To turn on mouse scroll again, Press Ctrl + B and Type :set -g mouse on and Press Enter key.

settings.DescAutomaticImageUpdateFromRepo: When new image comes out, update current image automatically. Please turn off when you preserve the current environment without updating.
settings.DescUseCLIonGUI: Provide Backend.AI CLI on GUI app/web. Requires Backend.AI CLI image.
settings.DescUseGUIonWeb: Provide Backend.AI GUI as a web service. Requires Backend.AI Web UI image.
settings.NoteAboutFixedSetup: Note: The settings below are automatically applied depending on the installation environment and status.
settings.DescAllowAgentSideRegistration:
Allow agent to register itself to manager.
Use only if Backend.AI cluster is managed on secure location.
settings.DescCUDAGPUsupport:
NVidia CUDA GPU support.
Requires Backend.AI CUDA Plugin.
settings.CUDAGPUdisabledByFGPUsupport: Disabled because system uses Fractional GPU plugin
settings.DescROCMGPUsupport:
AMD ROCm GPU support.
Requires Backend.AI ROCm Plugin.
settings.JobSchedulerUpdated: Default job scheduler has been updated.
settings.ConfigPerJobSchdulerDescription: The values in the scheduler setting is the defaults to use when there is no scheduler setting in each resource group. If there is a resource group-specific setting, this value will be ignored.
settings.SessionCreationRetriesDescription: If the session creation fails, the session creation is retried for the value specified in here. If the session cannot be created within the trials, the request will be ignored and Backend.AI will process the next request.
settings.FifoOnly: Currently, changes are only possible when the scheduler is FIFO.
settings.InvalidValue: Please put the correct input value.
settings.EnvConfigWillDisappear: Any unsaved environment variable and value will be disappeared.
settings.DescFractionalGPU: Use Fractional GPU feature with GPU virtualization.
settings.RequireFGPUPlugin: Requires Backend.AI Virtual CUDA API Layer Plugin.
settings.RequireTPUPlugin: Requires resource nodes on Google Cloud with Cloud TPU enabled / binded.
settings.DescImagePullBehavior: Determines the conditions for automatically downloading new images when a new version is registered in the registry. For none, new images will not be automatically downloaded.
settings.OverlayNetworkConfiguration: Configuration to use when creating overlay networks.
settings.OverlayNetworkSettingsDescription: An overlay network is a computer network that is layered on top of another network. The overlay network creates a distributed network among multiple Docker daemon hosts of the Backend.AI manager.
settings.MTUDescription: Maximum transmission unit, the size of the largest packet that a network protocol can transmit.

information.DescRedisVersion:
Cache / temporary storage for Backend.AI.
Also uses as asynchronous communication along agents.
information.DescDefaultAdministratorAccountChanged: SHOULD change the default account / password for production use.
information.DescUsesSSL: HTTPS with proper SSL setup helps system security.
information.DescIsLicenseValid: Validates the license currently installed on the system.
information.DescLicenseType:
The type of license currently used in the system.
For fixed licenses, execution rights are given only to predetermined hardware. In the case of variable licenses, execution rights are granted for cluster hardware within the limits of the agreement.
information.DescLicensee: Information about the organization or buyer licensed for use.
information.DescLicenseKey: Authentication key for permission to use. Please keep it secure.
information.DescExpiration: The validity period of the license. If the period is over, the cluster software will be stopped.
